texts.title: Cookie Preferences
texts.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.

necessary.name: Strictly Necessary
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

preferences.name: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced features.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.
